description: Police say the crash involved a white Mercedes-Benz and an electric bicycle.
title: Boy, 14, taken to hospital after e-bike crash
title_page: Alfreton: Boy, 14, taken to hospital after e-bike crash - BBC News
maintext:
A 14-year-old boy has been taken to hospital after a crash involving a car in Derbyshire.
Derbyshire Police said officers were called to King Street, Alfreton, at about 16:30 GMT on Saturday following the collision between a white Mercedes-Benz and a boy on an electric bicycle.
The boy was taken to hospital to be treated for injuries that were not thought to be life-threatening, the force said.
Officers added after the collision, another driver told witnesses they had a dashcam, and they are appealing for that driver to come forward.
